channel.title: HyBriD PvP V3 online messages

item.title: HyBriD PvP V3 online messages
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

I have made a new public void in my client.java for my source and theres no errors but the messages dont show
up when a co-owner or main owner loggs in

“[Main Owner/Coder]: Jahid has logged in”

Tell me if im missing anything

public void loginMessage() { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[j]; switch (playerRights) { case 1: // moderator c2.sendMessage("[Moderator] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); break; case 4: // Donator c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000[Donator] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); break; case 2: // adminstrator c2.sendMessage("[Administrator] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); break; case 3: // Co Owner / Owner if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("jahid")) { c2.sendMessage("[Main Owner/Coder] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); } else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zingerman30")) { c2.sendMessage("[Owner] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); } else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("sam akin")) { c2.sendMessage("[Main Owner] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); } else { c2.sendMessage("[Co Owner] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has just logged in."); } } } } }

Read full topic
